event_text: r_c finds a patch of odd red orchids. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/decides/decide} to take a pair of it's prettiest blooms for a gift to give to m_c! m_c decorates {PRONOUN/m_c/self} with the pretty flowers, cooing softly at how pretty {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} feel with them on.
m_c tilts {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} head at the camp wall. Nobody's entirely sure why... until {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/plucks/pluck} a few ivy leaves off of the wall, and wear it with pride.

r_c finds a pretty, smelly field of onions with pretty pink blooms. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/takes/take} a few, and {VERB/r_c/gifts/gift} the stalks to m_c! m_c wears them all with a big sunny smile.
r_c gifted m_c bunches of pretty purple flowers! m_c wears them all with a big sunny smile.
m_c finds a pretty pink flower! {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/wears/wear} it with a smile.
m_c received a present, dried but vibrant acc_plural, from r_c and decided to keep it with {PRONOUN/m_c/object} on {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} pelt.

m_c pokes around in the fresh kill pile. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/manages/manage} to scavenge a whole bird skull! ...Gross! r_c helps {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} wash it and properly clean it before m_c wears it around camp.
